desc: Defence Against the Dark Arts professor in Harry's first year, possessed by Lord Voldemort, and was killed in Philosopher's Stone.

label: Regulus Black
desc: younger brother of Sirius Black.

label: Remus Lupin
desc: Gryffindor student before Harry's time, a friend of James Potter, werewolf, Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts in Harry's third year, member of the Order of the Phoenix, killed in the Battle of Hogwarts.

label: Rita Skeeter
desc: Reporter for the Daily Prophet, author of The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore, unregistered animagus.

label: Rodolphus Lestrange
desc: Death Eater, brother of Rabastan Lestrange, husband of Bellatrix Lestrange.

label: Roger Davies
desc: Ravenclaw student two years above Harry, Quidditch Chaser and Captain, went to Yule Ball with Fleur Delacour.

label: Ron Weasley
desc: Best friends with Harry Potter and Hermione Granger, youngest Son of Arthur and Molly Weasley, Quidditch Keeper, member of Dumbledore's Army.

label: Rufus Scrimgeour
desc: Head of the Auror Office, replaces Cornelius Fudge as Minister for Magic, killed by Death Eaters.

label: Albert Runcorn
desc: Ministry of Magic employee of high rank during the administration under Pius Thicknesse

label: Seamus Finnigan
desc: Gryffindor student in Harry's year, member of Dumbledore's Army, best friend of Dean Thomas, Irish.

label: Sirius Black
desc: Godfather of Harry Potter, member of the Order of the Phoenix and prisoner on the run. Killed by Bellatrix Lestrange in the Order of the Phoenix.

label: Severus Snape
desc: Potions and later Defence Against the Dark Arts professor at Hogwarts, Head of Slytherin House, member of both the Death Eaters and the Order of the Phoenix to spy for Dumbledore.

label: Stanley Shunpike
desc: Conductor of the Knight Bus, later jailed in Azkaban on suspicions of being a Death Eater.

label: Ted Tonks
desc: Muggle-born husband of Andromeda and father of Nymphadora Tonks.

label: Terry Boot
desc: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year, member of Dumbledore's Army.

label: Dean Thomas
desc: Gryffindor student in Harry's year, member of Dumbledore's Army, Quidditch Chaser, briefly Ginny one of Weasley's boyfriends.

label: Thorfinn Rowle
desc: Death Eater.

label: Tom
desc: landlord, innkeeper, and barman of the pub, Leaky Cauldron, in Diagon Alley.

label: Travers
desc: wizard and a Death Eater. Escaped from Azkaban after Lord Voldemort's return.

label: Sybill Trelawney
desc: Divination professor at Hogwarts, predicted the prophecy that prompted Lord Voldemort to go after the Potters.

label: Dolores Umbridge
desc: Senior Undersecretary to the Minister for Magic, Defence Against the Dark Arts professor, Hogwarts High Inquisitor, Headmistress of Hogwarts, who enthusiastically joins in the persecution of half-bloods under Voldemort.

label: Vernon Dursley
desc: Muggle uncle of Harry Potter, married to his aunt Petunia and father of Dudley Dursley.

label: Viktor Krum
desc: Bulgarian Quidditch seeker and Durmstrang student who participated in the Triwizard Tournament, dated Hermione for several months.

label: Lord Voldemort
desc: Tom Marvolo Riddle; the villain of the series, the murderer of Harry Potter's parents and many others in his quest for immortality and absolute power.

label: Walburga Black
desc: Married to her second cousin Orion Black, mother of Sirius and Regulus Black.

label: Walden Macnair
desc: executioner of the Committee of Disposal of Dangerous Creatures, Death Eater, injured badly and possibly killed by Hagrid during the Battle of Hogwarts after being slammed into a wall.

label: Xenophilius Lovegood
desc: Father of Luna Lovegood, editor of The Quibbler.

label: Corban Yaxley
desc: Death Eater, Head of Magical Law Enforcement under Voldemort's regime.

label: Zacharias Smith
desc: Hufflepuff student probably either in Harry's year or one year belo, member of Dumbledore's Army.
